mapper.select: select count(*) from board where status = 'Y' and board_type = 1

select b.board_no , b.board_title , b.board_content , b.count , m.nickname , to_char(b.create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , a.file_path || a.change_name as "thumbnail" from board b left join attachment a on b.board_no = a.ref_bno join member m on b.board_writer = m.user_no where b.status = 'Y' and b.board_type = 1 order by b.board_no desc
mapper.update: update board set count = count + 1 where board_no = #{boardNo} and status = 'Y'
